website_summaries.verdict: A terrific universal socket wrench for heavy-duty personal or professional use.
pros: Wrench's center pins retract and its outer pins surround a fastener to deliver a tight grip
Features a torque of over 100 lbs
Self-adjusts for all shapes and sizes
Works well on rusted and damaged heads
cons: Side prongs sometimes get stuck in place during use
May require you to push down hard to wrap the wrench around a bolt

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Was better at stripping and eating the screws and nuts than anything. Not enough grip to fully tighten bolts. Sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell Youngman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of the Chinese version!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the original USA-made version and the seller advertised his garbage as the original. He even used images of the USA-made product. This trash broke after one use!!! I always look to see where an item is being shipped from when I make a purchase. I couldn't find it anywhere on Amazon, so I took a gamble at the cheap price. Do yourself a favor.. leave Amazon and go right to Endeavor Tool's website!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a fine tool, but shouldn't advertise that it's a brand name when it's not. No Gator Grip branding what so ever. Just a plain ratchet and $2 more expensive than the real thing at Walmart. Also, doesn't come in original packaging, just a clear plastic bag in a cardboard box
customer_reviews.author: Nate T.

customer_reviews.title: Replaces a lot of tools!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how well this works on just about anything you need to loosen that isn't perfectly round. Perfect for that weekend handyperson who doesn't want to buy a whole lot of tools. Just cover whatever it is you want to remove with the Gator Grip and twist and chances are really high it will come off (or go on, if that's what you want)!
customer_reviews.author: T. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Works great for it's intended purpose but it's NOT a "deep" socket.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for quick removal or tightening of several nuts of different sizes - but ONLY for nuts where the bolt doesn't extend much beyond the nut.
customer_reviews.author: Dean S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not "Gator Grip", just a generic, low-quality tool in counterfeit packaging
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is an abysmal-quality product in counterfeit packaging. It's not made in the USA, nothing like the quality pictured in the photos, and the socket itself has no identifiable branding whatsoever, only size ranges. The packaging has some Gator Grip branding (guess they're learning to not send things in Ziplock bags at least), but even that attempt at copying the brand was rather lacking in quality and nothing like what is pictured in the product photos.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Also I usually have to hold the universal head to get a good turn in
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the nuts or bolts get completely stuck in this. Also I usually have to hold the universal head to get a good turn in. Really difficult to tell when using if the bolt's tightened, getting stripped, or still loose.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Put This in Your Toolbox
customer_reviews.text: A long, long time ago, somebody said that nothing new would ever be invented. Man, was he wrong. This device is very interesting, and it works, too. Put this in your toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: A must-have!
customer_reviews.text: A must-have in anyone's tool kit. I got this as a gift for my husband and he LOVES it - great in time sensitive projects where you don't want to run to the store every 10 minutes for a new tool.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Worst tool ever made go back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase I have ever made on amazon this product was the cheapest and I would not recommend someone to purchase this tool ratchet broke first time use this is made for plastic toys
customer_reviews.author: Anteney Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product--I was able to change the tires on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware of first time sellers and buy from Amazon Prime instead. If the price is higher, it's still worth it in saved aggravation. This is an excellent product--I was able to change the tires on my lawn mower with ease. I also bought one as a gift for a friend. E. Adair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a handy tool, but it can't do much ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a handy tool, but it can't do much torque so don't use it for heavy duty jobs. It also came to me scratched and in a plastic sleeve that was stapled together with an instructions card thrown in...hmmm did they sell me a used tool?
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Michael Caro

customer_reviews.title: Grips surprisingly well, but not good for high power high speed
customer_reviews.text: in my electric drill, this thing is a bit loose, doesn't keep straight, so I don't get a nice stable feeling. However it works well on eye hooks bigger than can be handled by the "CUP/EYE HOOK DRIVER 1/4IN HX" and less likely to fly off. Pins haven't stuck on me yet, but I've used this only 4 or 5 times. Looks like something you want to keep in a ziplock bag to avoid drying or oxidizing
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good product works well and it is easy to lubricate and maintain
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product if used thoughtfully
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. If you're not focused and using it carefully, you can damage it. It's not rugged. But it's good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS PICTURED!
customer_reviews.text: The package that came is clearly a refund package! It was cut open and isn’t what is pictured at all!!! It’s a different brand!! I am so mad and disappointed! I will be returning it today!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Socket alone!
customer_reviews.text: The Universal socket seems great, but the handle that was sent with it is crap. I have to return it because they don't fit together. I'll buy the socket by itself and use my own ratchet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy as a pocket on a shirt
customer_reviews.text: I have this wrench in my little tool box and it handles 85% of the stuff I come across. I'm not a DIY expert but really like how it adjusts and gets it off. Nice little gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Jlarge

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to have around
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have around ... especially if you are a senior woman with arthritis and always trying to fix things without calling on others. Then, when I do have to call on others, it makes their task a lot easier!
customer_reviews.author: BleuBird

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this unless you want a Made in China knockoff
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking to buy what is actually described and pictured for this item (Gator Grip, made in USA), look elsewhere. If you buy here, you will likely get a made in China knockoff like I did. Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: DJWa2

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL LOVE THIS TOOL
customer_reviews.text: You don't even have to be properly lined-up with the bolt for this thing to work! Its amazing. Very easy to use. Its my new favorite tool and replaces a half a drawer full of wrenches and sockets. It actually lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love Gator Grip
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Ordered one for my husband for Fathers Day. I opened it and tried it out. Loved it so much that I ordered 3 more - one for my car, one for my son, and an extra.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L.

customer_reviews.title: The prongs in side stick every time you use it.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this the little 'prongs' in side stuck down (not all but most of them) and I had to pry them back up. They continued to stick every time so I finally trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Was supposed to be made in USA and be authentic gate grip, but was imposter made in China
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this believing I was getting an actual gator grip set, made in the USA. Instead it came in a bag that said "multifunction tools with handle, made in China".
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Usually just another run of the mill as seen on ...
customer_reviews.text: Usually just another run of the mill as seen on tv things but this legit works. I'm a utility locator and sometimes they don't have the right tool at the shop to fit certain size bolts. This is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Frankforther

customer_reviews.title: Gatorgrip
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have to dig for the right size tool , it’s all there in one !
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn Weber

customer_reviews.title: So much for prime shipping...going on 10 days without product
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be delivered on December 20th and I have yet to get the product. Contacted the company and didn't give me any updates but said should just be a few more days. That was a couple days ago. The tracking number isn't giving me updates. I'll update my review once/if I get the product. So much for it bring a Christmas present...
customer_reviews.author: Ststeffes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, a little hard to get over bolts but easy enough once you get use to it.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Comes in real handy and you don't have to look for the exact right socket. Wish it was a tiny bit larger surface area for larger bolts

customer_reviews.title: handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool-someone first introduced me to it at our horse club and it comes in handy without having to carry my whole ratchet set with me. The only thing I noticed was that it sticks sometimes during use and I had some difficulty removing it from the bolt when I was done. Otherwise great and a creative invention.

customer_reviews.title: I Beat My Local Repairman to the Fix
customer_reviews.text: If I can fix something myself without calling someone in to do it, It feels wonderful. We had a clothesline that had to come down, but I didn't have the right tool for doing this until I ordered this Gator Grip Universal Socket. The clothesline came down without a hitch, I gained a new tool, and saved on the total repair.

customer_reviews.title: Must have

customer_reviews.title: One of the most useful and convenient things you can put in a toolbox.

product_meta.title: Endeavor Tool Company 200MO Gator Grip the Original Universal Socket 3PC Kit. Made in the USA. Self-Adjusts for shape and size as well as Standard and Metric application
product_meta.description:
Endeavor Tool Company 200MO Gator Grip the Original Universal Socket 3PC Kit. Made in the USA. Self-Adjusts for shape and size as well as Standard and Metric application

AMAZON.COM
The Gator Grip Universal Socket is a universal socket that instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, screw eyes, hooks, lag screws, and bolt heads. It features a wide range of adjustability that will fit standard 1/4-inch to 3/4-inch and metric 7mm to 19mm nuts and bolt heads. The tool's socket contains 54 hardened steel spring pins for long-lasting durability. When placed onto a fastener, the center pins retract and the outer pins surround the fastener. As the fastener is turned, the torque is transmitted through the outer pins to the walls of the socket, making this socket an ideal choice for heavy-duty personal or professional use. The tool features a 3/8-inch drive, and comes with a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

 What's in the Box
Drill adapter and ratcheting socket wrench with 3/8-inch drive.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Gator Grip is a universal socket that instantly adjusts to grip hex nuts, screw eyes, hooks, lag screws, and bolt heads Fits standard 1/4- to 3/4-inch and metric 7-19mm nuts and bolt heads.

See more
feature_bullets: 3/8 drive professional grade socket. Self-adjusts for all shapes and size fasteners except a perfectly round head, just file and edge.
Self-adjusts from ¼” to ¾” standard and 7mm-19mm metric.
Has a torque of over 100 LB/FT of power.
Drill adaptor turns any drill into a Power Socket Set. Adapter and 3/8 Drive reversible ratchet included
Replaces a tool box full of tolls and so easy to use.

specifications.Included Components: Endeavor Tool Company 200MO Gator Grip the Original Universal Socket 3PC Kit. Made in the USA. Self-Adjusts for shape and size as well as Standard and Metric application
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars729 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
